attributes.action: Sue HMV for losing record of 3000 McFly sales.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: McFly's new single 'One For The Radio' was at number one until HMV's computer 'crashed' and lost record of 3000 sales. However, HMV did not lose a record of any other artist and knew that it was 3000 McFly sales. They also refused to add them back on, so McFly lost out on a number one single because of HMV.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
